page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: IN{BRUNTON}AREA THERE ARE ABOUT{TWENTY {HOUSES.}MOST OF THEM ARE MADE OF{STONE AND{CONCRETE.}SOME OF THEM ARE MADE OF {BRICK}WITH{HARLING}ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE{HOUSE.}SOME OF THE{HOUSES}IN OR AROUND{BRUNTON}HAVE{PRESERVATION {ORDERS}ON THEM SO THAT THE OWNER MAY NOT CHANGE THE{APPEARANCE}OF THE FRONT.{HOUSING}IS A MIXTURE OF {DETACHED,SEMI-DETACHED}TWO{STORIED {HOUSES,}AND{BUNGALOWS.}SOME{HOUSES HAVE{BAY WINDOWS.}LOTS OF{HOUSES}ARE {CONVERTED}OR{MODERNISED}IN THE AREA; A {PUBLIC HOUSE}WHICH IS NOW A SHED.AND THERE IS A FARM HOUSE WHICH IS NOW A { {DWELLING,}A {HOUSE }WHICH WAS ONCE A { {PIG STY,}AN{EX-BLACKSMITH'S SMIDDY } AND SOME {WEAVERS' COTTAGES}NOW USED AS{SHEDS. }
